software.name: Road Rash
software.Description: This is what 32-bit action is all about. The #1 racing/combat series for 16-bit explodes onto the 3DO system packed with music and videos featuring A&M Records' hottest alternative bands. Five new race environments offer heart-stopping realism and all the lawless high-speed action Road Rash fans expect. In-game action digitized from real life for vicious combat you can almost feel! 600 photo-realistic road objects, 15 hot cycles, including Nitro bikes, and 5 new courses, each with 5 new levels!

software.name: Robinson's Requiem
software.Description: Robinson's Requiem is an Action game, developed by Silmarils and published by ReadySoft, which was released in 1996.

software.name: Royal Pro Wrestling
software.Description: Royal Pro Wrestling is a Sports game, published by Natsume, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Royal Pro Wrestling: Jikkyou Live!!
software.Description: Royal Pro Wrestling is a Sports game, published by Natsume, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Sample This!
software.Description: Sample This! is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Crystal Dynamics, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Samurai Shodown
software.Description: Iza To! En Garde! Dude! Twelve of the mightiest samurai, ninja, knights, and warriors from Japan, France, the United States, and China lock swords in SAMURAI SHODOWN. With blades, bare knuckles, rage, and various Methods of Mayhem, fight your way to the final battle with Satan's Shogun. Use all powers at your disposal to get a head!

software.name: San Goku Shi IV
software.Description: It's the Second Han Dynasty and China is on the verge of collapse. Infighting among the court families and the emergence of powerful warlords dominates the landspace. The struggle for power has brought an era known as the Three Kingdoms, complete with constant warfare among China's most courageous and skillful heroes. As a ruler during these difficult times, it's up to you to unify a country torn apart by rebellion. Expand your kingdom by building a strong military or try outsmarting your rivals during negotiations. With exciting new weapons including automatic firing crossbows and catapults, you can engage your opponents out in the open or from behind castle walls. But don't forget, a ruler's strength is also measured by the economic power of his kingdom and the happiness of its people!

software.name: Santa Fe Trail
software.Description: Santa Fe Trail is an Action game, published by American Laser Games, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Scavenger 4
software.Description: Scavenger 4 is an Action game, published by Psygnosis, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Scorched Earth
software.Description: Scorched Earth is an Action game, published by Electronic Arts, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Scramble Cobra
software.Description: Scramble Cobra is a Simulation game, developed by Genki and published by Pack-In-Video, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Seal of the Pharaoh
software.Description: Seal of the Pharaoh is an Action game, developed by System Sacom and published by ASK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Seawolf SSN-21
software.Description: Seawolf SSN-21 is an Action game, published by Electronic Arts, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Secre: Fuumin no Omocha Hako
software.Description: Secre: Fuumin no Omocha Hako is a Miscellaneous game, published by Grams', which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Seimei Handan
software.Description: Seimei Handan is a Miscellaneous game, published by Ariadne, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Sesame Street: Numbers
software.Description: The EXCITING technology of 3DO brings Sesame Street characters to life. KIDS join Elmo for a jaunt up and down the street, where they PLAY interactive learning games about NUMBERS and MATH. They can also call their favorite characters on the phone and ENJOY more than an hours worth of SONGS and VIDEO from the Sesame Street show. Designed by the EDUCATIONAL specialists at Children's Television Workshop, Sesame Street Numbers is chock-full of ACTIVITIES and amazing animations that will provide hours of FUN while reinforcing important learning SKILLS.

software.name: Sewer Shark
software.Description: Sewer Shark is an Action game, developed by Digital Pictures and published by Hasbro Interactive, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Sex
software.Description: How do office politics and sex mix? Let Nikki Dial, P.J. Sparxx, and Crystal Wilder show you how they got ahead in a man's world.

software.name: Shadow Warriors
software.Description: The leader of S.H.A.D.O.W., the world's largest criminal organization, has just been brutally murdered. From around his vast criminal empire they have come to do battle, seven of the Shadow King's best lieutenants. To the winner will go the ultimate prize: the right to be named the next Shadow King. To the losers, there is only death. SHADOW: War of Succession is a fast-paced fighting game that features live, full-sized, digitized actors. The characters possess their own distinct special moves and weapons. This game uses photo-realistic 3D rendered backgrounds. Full cinematic scenes and hundreds of digitized sound effects and real voices intensify the furious fighting action!

software.name: Shadow: War of Succession
software.Description: The leader of S.H.A.D.O.W., the world's largest criminal organization, has just been brutally murdered. From around his vast criminal empire they have come to do battle, seven of the Shadow King's best lieutenants. To the winner will go the ultimate prize: the right to be named the next Shadow King. To the losers, there is only death. SHADOW: War of Succession is a fast-paced fighting game that features live, full-sized, digitized actors. The characters possess their own distinct special moves and weapons. This game uses photo-realistic 3D rendered backgrounds. Full cinematic scenes and hundreds of digitized sound effects and real voices intensify the furious fighting action!

software.name: Shanghai: Banri no Choujou
software.Description: Just when you thought your Shanghai stragety was as solid as the Great Wall of China...Three captivating new games with enticing new rules, plus Classic Shanghai for the purist. Play each game in a head-to-head tournament against a friend - or race the clock in a series of games. Perfect your stragety under extreme competitive conditions. Accept the ultimate Shanghai: Triple-Threat challenge.

software.name: Shanghai: Triple Threat
software.Description: Just when you thought your Shanghai stragety was as solid as the Great Wall of China...Three captivating new games with enticing new rules, plus Classic Shanghai for the purist. Play each game in a head-to-head tournament against a friend - or race the clock in a series of games. Perfect your stragety under extreme competitive conditions. Accept the ultimate Shanghai: Triple-Threat challenge.

software.name: Shanghai: Triple-Threat
software.Description: Just when you thought your Shanghai stragety was as solid as the Great Wall of China...Three captivating new games with enticing new rules, plus Classic Shanghai for the purist. Play each game in a head-to-head tournament against a friend - or race the clock in a series of games. Perfect your stragety under extreme competitive conditions. Accept the ultimate Shanghai: Triple-Threat challenge.

software.name: Shelley Duvall's It's a Bird's Life
software.Description: Join a lovable group of parrots on an odyssey to the Amazon rain forest. After a fire at their Los Angeles home, the birds fly south in search of paradise and discover a whole lot more. You'll grow to love Mowgli, Pearlie, Humpty and the rest of the friendly flock as you fly along and share their many exciting experiences. As you enjoy the story, explore 60 beautifully illustrated and animated scenes to play lots of games, puzzles and other interactive activities. Join in sing-alongs and learn about world geography, the rain forest, clouds and birds. Written and narrated by Shelley Duvall, It's a Bird's Life is wholesome fun for the entire family!

Release.name: Shelley Duvall's It's a Bird's Life

ReleaseImages.Image: Shelley Duvall's It's a Bird's Life (US)-313069_front.jpg
Shelley Duvall's It's a Bird's Life (US)-313069_back.jpg

software.name: Shockwave
software.Description: A fictional nightmare becomes a reality as a vast armada of exotic alien warships unleashes a deadly assault. Utterly surprised, Earth's armed forces are crushed. Only the orbital space carrier Omaha and its experimental F-177 heavy fighters survive. London is burning. Los Angeles is devastated. The Amazon is crawling with alien forces. You and your elite squadron of crack fighter pilots must repel the marauding hordes and save the human race from total devastation.

software.name: Shockwave 2: Beyond the Gate
software.Description: Shockwave 2: Beyond the Gate is a Simulation game, developed and published by Electronic Arts, which was released in 1995.

software.name: Shockwave: Operation Jumpgate
software.Description: Shockwave: Operation Jumpgate is a Simulation game, published by Electronic Arts Victor, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Short Warp
software.Description: Short Warp is a Miscellaneous game, published by WARP, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Sid Meier's C.P.U. Bach
software.Description: Once in a while a product changes how we think about computers. Once in a lifetime a product changes how computers think about us. C.P.U. Bach - the latest composition of award-winning software designer Sid Meier is conscious software, a transcendant computer program that actually creates original classical music in the style of legendary composer Johann Sebastian Bach. Concerti, fugues, minuets, chorales - original music of beauty, brilliance and inspiration - anytime. The innovation doesn't end there. C.P.U. Bach also harnesses the powerful 3DO graphics engine to deliver abstract graphics to match the mood and tempo of the music.

software.name: Slam 'n Jam '95
software.Description: Biggest players! Fastest 5 on 5 action! Rotoscoped moves! Here you can strip and dip, shake and bake, and knock down twos all over the court! Pound the hardwood in the Franchise Player mode for an entire season. Dominate the boards as the go-to center or pull up at the arc and drain a 3 pointer as a point guard. Replay all the in-your-face highlights. Fully controllable from all angles. Tailor made for gloating. Hit the Speed Burst and go eye-to-eye with the iron. Call double teams, make roster substitutions, reject shots into the fourth row, set screens and picks. Get pumped with CD quality stadium music, sampled shoe squeaks and fanatical crowd noises.

software.name: Slam 'n Jam '95: 3D Basketball
software.Description: Biggest players! Fastest 5 on 5 action! Rotoscoped moves! Here you can strip and dip, shake and bake, and knock down twos all over the court! Pound the hardwood in the Franchise Player mode for an entire season. Dominate the boards as the go-to center or pull up at the arc and drain a 3 pointer as a point guard. Replay all the in-your-face highlights. Fully controllable from all angles. Tailor made for gloating. Hit the Speed Burst and go eye-to-eye with the iron. Call double teams, make roster substitutions, reject shots into the fourth row, set screens and picks. Get pumped with CD quality stadium music, sampled shoe squeaks and fanatical crowd noises.

software.name: Slayer
software.Description: You're not a helpless kid any more. You've grown up and you've got Slayer, the first Advanced Dungeons & Dragons game available for the 3DO Interactive Multiplayer system. Now you're an AD&D game hero armed with weapons and magic, exploring dungeons filled with the deadly monsters of your nightmares. Hack and slash away at these vile creatures, avoid treacherous traps, and solve mind-bending puzzles. The randomized dungeon generator can create over 4 billion different dungeons - that's a new monster hunt every time you play! Because it's designed for play on the 3DO system, Slayer gives you the most awesome graphics and animation you've ever seen. Plus a first-person perspective that lets you look up, down, and all around. It's virtually real!
software.AKA: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons: Slayer (US, EU), Advanced Dungeons & Dragons: Lost Dungeon (JP)

software.name: Slopestyle
software.Description: Slopestyle is an Action game, developed by L3 Interactive and published by 3DO, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Snow Job
software.Description: She's sexy, smart, savvy. No wonder she fills your dreams. No wonder she's number one on the hit list of a notorious drug lord. Tracy Scoggins is New York DA Lara Calabreze - the long arm (and legs) of the law. One of 20 informants is out to blow her away, and you've got to save her. It's big. It's intense. Can you thwart a plot to murder the woman you still love? Or will you be too late?

software.name: Soccer Kid
software.Description: Seconds before the Soccer Cup final was to begin, a marauding alien pirate swoops down and steals the Soccer Cup trophy. Gloating on his latest acquisition, the careless alien collides with an orbiting satellite. The precious trophy is smashed into five pieces which fall back to Earth. Join Soccer Kid in his quest to recover and reassemble the scattered pieces of the Soccer Cup. Grab a ball. There's no time to lose!

software.name: Sotsugyou II: Neo Generation Special
software.Description: Sotsugyou II: Neo Generation Special is a Strategy game, developed by Fill-In Cafe and published by SharRock, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Sotsugyou: Graduation Final
software.Description: Sotsugyou: Graduation Final is an Adventure game, published by SharRock, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Space Ace
software.Description: The evil commander Borf has kidnapped Ace's girlfriend, the beautiful Kimberly, and is plotting to enslave the Earth using his dreaded "Infanto Ray", a weapon that changes everyone it blasts into a helpless baby. Armed with only a laser gun, Ace must find and destroy the Infanto Ray, rescue Kimberly and save the Earth. All in a day's work for a superhero, right? Featuring full screen animation and crisp, powerful sound from the original laser disc arcade classic, Space Ace delivers arcade action at its most addictive!

software.name: Space Hulk: Vengeance of the Blood Angels
software.Description: A huge and out-of-control derelict spaceship is racing towards the Imperial planet Delvar III. The honor has befallen the Blood Angels chapter of Imperial Space Marines to board this gargantuan Space Hulk, battle through hordes of Genestealer aliens, divert it from its course and save the planet from certain destruction. Featuring vicious hand-to-hand combat, awesome pre-rendered animations to further illustrate the story, and complete freedom of movement in a detailed 3-D environment.

Release.name: Space Hulk: Vengeance of the Blood Angels

ReleaseImages.Image: Space Hulk Vengeance of the Blood Angels (US)-26169_front.jpg
Space Hulk Vengeance of the Blood Angels (US)-26169_back.jpg
Space Hulk Vengeance of the Blood Angels (US)-26169_side.jpg
Space Hulk Vengeance of the Blood Angels (US)-26169_top.jpg

software.name: Space Pirates
software.Description: Planet-hopping pirates led by the scourge of the universe, the evil Captain Talon, have captured a ship of innocent space colonists. The player's Star Ranger must save the colonists and head off Talon's plans to rule the universe. The player will face hordes of pirates in an effort to collect energy crystals from a variety of worlds. The crystals power the star splitter cannon, the only weapon that can blast Talon and his misfits into another galaxy.

software.name: Space Shuttle
software.Description: An abundance of space debris orbiting Earth endangers the safety of future shuttle missions! In an exciting arcade-style game, you use the laser guns on your remote controlled satellite to seek and destroy this debris in fiery cinematic explosions!

software.name: Star Control II
software.Description: Overthrow the Ur-Quan masters! Prepare yourself for an epic adventure that spans the extremes of space. Struggle to liberate Earth from alien imperialism. Star Control II is now enhanced with CD quality music, voice and sound effects! Stunning 3D full motion animations created on Silicon Graphics workstations. Trade insults with 18 alien races as you wheel and deal your way through space. Explore over 3,000 planets in 500 different star systems. Customize your flagship into the ultimate battleship!

software.name: Star Fighter
software.Description: You are the only crack pilot who can test the most advanced ship ever to join the FedNet fleet. Get ready to put your life into the hands of the boys in R&D. 60 tough missions test your metal against hundreds of enemies. Immerse yourself in a vast 3D world. Soar. Explore. Scorch thousands of enemy targets. Battle on the ground, at sea, in the air, and in space-even the sky is no limit for this mighty ship. But don't lose your head, or you'll find the inventive aliens using it as a souvenir ash tray.

software.name: Star Wars: Rebel Assault
software.Description: Rebel Forces have won their first battle against the dark side... But the war has only just begun! As Rookie One, you are drawn into a 3D galaxy far, far away to crush the evil Empire once and for all. Take your T16 Skyscraper on a training run through Beggar's Canyon. Then dodge asteroids and blast TIE fighters in a deep space rumble... tackle a fleet of menacing AT-ATs on the ice tundra of Hoth... and utimately annihilate Vadir and the evil Empire with a kamikaze trench gun on the infamous Death Star.

software.name: Starblade
software.Description: Ultimately, it has come down to this. You, alone in the gunner chair with the entire Red Eye armada in your face. Grab hold of your 15-ton lasercannon and rumble with wave after wave of unrelenting alien mercenaries. Descend deep into the evil mechanized Planet Red Eye and obliterate the Octopus power source. Destroy the omnipotent iceberg battleship and the unbeatable flagship Commander. Execute Operation Starblade. Starblade... Blink and you're history!

software.name: StarFighter
software.Description: You are the only crack pilot who can test the most advanced ship ever to join the FedNet fleet. Get ready to put your life into the hands of the boys in R&D. 60 tough missions test your metal against hundreds of enemies. Immerse yourself in a vast 3D world. Soar. Explore. Scorch thousands of enemy targets. Battle on the ground, at sea, in the air, and in space-even the sky is no limit for this mighty ship. But don't lose your head, or you'll find the inventive aliens using it as a souvenir ash tray.

software.name: Station Invasion
software.Description: Station Invasion is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by 3DO, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Stellar 7: Draxon no Gyakushuu
software.Description: Gir Draxon's back!! Two thousand years in the future, mankind fights against an ancient enemy. Gir Draxon, Overlord of the Arcturan Empire, has returned with a mysterious Warplink capable of funneling his Death Cruisers from distant worlds. You and a prototype heavy assault vehicle, code-named Raven, are all that stand between the Arcturan invasion fleet and the certain destruction of Terran command.

software.name: Stellar 7: Draxon's Revenge
software.Description: Gir Draxon's back!! Two thousand years in the future, mankind fights against an ancient enemy. Gir Draxon, Overlord of the Arcturan Empire, has returned with a mysterious Warplink capable of funneling his Death Cruisers from distant worlds. You and a prototype heavy assault vehicle, code-named Raven, are all that stand between the Arcturan invasion fleet and the certain destruction of Terran command.

software.name: Strahl
software.Description: Strahl is an Action game, developed by Data East and published by Media Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Striker: World Cup Special
software.Description: World Cup Tournament action with teams from 24 countries. You can do pass, trap, sliding tackle and more as a player. Six parameters for each player give them realistic character.

software.name: Super Real Mahjong P V
software.Description: Super Real Mahjong P V is a Miscellaneous game, published by Seta Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Super Real Mahjong PIV + Aishou Shindan
software.Description: Super Real Mahjong PIV + Aishou Shindan is a Miscellaneous game, published by Seta Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1995.

Release.name: Super Real Mahjong PIV + Aishou Shindan

ReleaseImages.Image: Super Real Mahjong PIV + Aishou Shindan (JP)-30230_front.jpg
Super Real Mahjong PIV + Aishou Shindan (JP)-30230_back.jpg

software.name: Super Street Fighter II Turbo
software.Description: Super Street Fighter II Turbo is an Action game, developed and published by Capcom, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Super Street Fighter II X
software.Description: Super Street Fighter II Turbo is an Action game, developed and published by Capcom, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Super Wing Commander
software.Description: Climbing into your cockpit, you smell the familiar scents of battle - the fresh rush of pure oxygen, the stench of sweat, the coppery tang of Durasteel. Your palms moisten as a rush of adrenaline quickens your pulse. You take what might be your last deep breath. Listening to the canopy hum overhead, you reach for the engage throttle button and brace yourself for launch. You're the Terran Confederation's best pilot. If you can't outsmart the Kilrathi cats, no one can! You've been summoned to defend the TCS Tiger's Claw - can you survive and continue the bloody battle against the Empire?

software.name: Supermodel Gail McKenna
software.Description: Supermodel Gail McKenna is a Miscellaneous game, published by Digital Production, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: SuperModels Go Wild
software.Description: SuperModels Go Wild is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Vivid Interactive, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Supreme Warrior
software.Description: Imagine you are a Kung Fu street fighter in a world ruled by evil warlords and cultmasters - except this time... it's real! The savage warlord Fang Tu promises to put everyone's heart on a stake unless he gets the mask that you have secreted in your sack. Your old master Kai delivers this warrior's challenge: you must battle each of Fang Tu's warlords, gain their special powers and defeat Fang Tu in order to save the day. Along the way, the beautiful Yu Ching - another of Master Kai's students - will give you what help she can. It won't be easy... these are some of the baddest dudes in China!

software.name: Sword & Sorcery
software.Description: A legendary story from unknown worlds beyond our time. The adventures of little sorceress Lucienne is a tale in the making...your own making. Work with Lucienne and her friends to defeat Death Shadow. Their fate is in your hands...Let the adventure begin...

software.name: Syndicate
software.Description: Mission Briefing: Sources indicate that a rival syndicate has developed a dangerous new computer program and our research boys want it. In the year 2096, the world is divided into regions controlled by a handful of massive corporations, struggling for dominance. Prepare yourself for the ultimate corporate takeover!

software.name: Taiketsu! Rooms
software.Description: Taiketsu! Rooms is an Action game, published by Sanyei Shobou, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Takeru
software.Description: Takeru is an Adventure game, published by Fun Project, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Tanjou: Debut Pure
software.Description: Tanjou: Debut Pure is a Strategy game, developed by Fill-In Cafe and published by SharRock, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Tarot Uranai
software.Description: Tarot Uranai is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Axes Art Amuse and published by Ariadne, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Tetsujin
software.Description: In a tower rising high above a desolate city, a mad-genius scientist pursues his experiments. His mission: to create the ultimate killing machine and purge the world! The means of achieving his wild ambition will soon be set in motion. All that remains is the last piece of equipment for Tetsujin... and YOU have been chosen. The assimilation process is underway. The scientist awaits you. Head for the top floor of the tower!

software.name: Tetsujin Returns
software.Description: A cybernetic battle to the death for the soul of mankind! You will be assimilated, if you can stay alive that long! In the depths of space, Tetsujin has been reconstructed, and YOUR mind is now bonded to his mechanized body. The massive, clandestine SCH organization has given you life, but now what is their plan? The golden Android, too, has returned to take his revenge against you. Battle past moloids and biomoloids bent on your destruction, or humanity is doomed!

Release.name: Iron Angel of the Apocalypse: The Return

software.name: Theme Park
software.Description: Think you can design and build the greatest amusement park in the world? You select the site, you layout the rides. In fact, you control every aspect of running a profitable amusement park; from hiring employees, to developing new rides, to maintaining an adequate supply of soft drinks. Any mistakes, and the bustling hordes of fun-seekers will let you know. Oh, and that Merry-go-round in flames is a clue too.

software.Description: Tigernaut: Beyond the Stars is an Action game, published by Videoact V LC, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: ToonTime ...in the classroom
software.Description: Cartoons are more fun than ever! ToonTime provides multimedia entertainment for children, as well as adults who are still young at heart. ToonTime... In the Classroom brings to your television a whole new method of interactivity never before available. Select randomly from six classic full color cartoons: Tweety, Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Popeye, Elmer Fudd and Superman, and play the chosen cartoon immediately (no more rewinding a videotape). Have fun manipulating the digitized cartoons by shrinking, enlarging, twisting and distorting them inside a classroom. Have more fun playing the cartoons on different classroom objects. Reshape and distort the objects as they bounce around the classroom.

software.name: Total Eclipse
software.Description: Blister bombs explode; shields buckle but hold. Take any more missile damage and you're toast. Hit the deck! Your reflexes better be faster than theirs. Trouble over every mountain, in every tunnel. Leopard tanks, bloody ambushes, deadly Drak-sai. Find 'em and kill 'em. Bury the stick in a snap roll. Planetary terrains scream by. Look too long and you're meat. Original 32-bit brain-melting space combat!

software.name: Totsugeki Kikan Megadasu!!
software.Description: Totsugeki Kikan (Karakuri) Megadasu!! is an Action game, developed and published by WARP, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Tower, The
software.Description: The Tower is a Strategy game, published by Open Book, which was released in Japan in 1996.

software.name: Tozasarata Tachi
software.Description: As a student of Egyptology searching for an ancient waterclock from the dynasty of the Pharaoh Ramses, you are the first person to walk onto the island of Matinicus, closed to visitors for more than 60 years. Meet young heiress Tess Conway, lost with her high society friends on the Summer Solstice, 1932. Tess was obsessed with the occult, and the water clock was rumored to grant everlasting life. Can you find the secret of youth and still escape alive? You are trapped in a first-person passage through unspeakable evil. Surrounded by hosts of the undead, use your wits and your weapons to make your way to the heart of this terrible mystery. Creep through dark hallways into the dim rooms of the past, speak to the video-real shades of former residents, and kill or be killed until you solve the mystery of Matinicus Isle.

software.name: Trip'd
software.Description: The first 3DO falling tile game. Play alone, with a friend or against the computer. Test your strategic skill with this exciting new action puzzle game. Feel your adrenaline flow as you race against time to demolish the alien eggs as they fall to earth. In order to destroy them you must arrange four or more in a group. However, if the eggs form a square, they band together and become a super alien. Your only tools are the 3DO system's control pad, your brain and your decision making ability.

software.name: TRY 3DO Interactive Multiplayer
software.Description: 3DO is a Hardware game, developed by 3DO and published by Panasonic, which was released in 1993.

software.name: Virtual Horror: Norowarate Yakata
software.Description:
Evil has entered the world, stealing into your very soul! The potent talisman that kept the undead banished has been broken, and evil now lurks in the shadows, waiting. Where are they?
Ominous echoes resound through the night. Can you, alone, defeat the horrors and restore the talisman? Perhaps, but the journey through the heart of Monster Manor may become an eternal nightmare!

software.name: Virtual Puppet Reika
software.Description: Virtual Puppet Reika is an Action game, developed by Kuki and published by h.a.n.d. Inc., which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Virtual Quest: Pharaoh no Fuuin
software.Description: Seal of the Pharaoh is an Action game, developed by System Sacom and published by ASK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Virtual Vivid Sampler
software.Description: Virtual Vivid Sampler is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Vivid Interactive, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Virtuoso
software.Description: Music and Virtual Reality are your only escapes in a world gone mad. Transform into a rock superstar on a 3D virtual quest where the Angry Red Planet, Mars, awaits your invasion. Or enter an eerie Haunted House with a few spectres of its own. Submerge yourself in our underwater biosphere, but beware, the reefs ahead hold many dangers. Music Video Clips and a hard rock soundtrack set the stage in this head-banging cyberfantasy adventure!

software.name: VR Stalker
software.Description: VR Stalker is a Simulation game, developed by Morpheus Interactive and published by American Laser Games, which was released in 1994.

software.Description: Waialae Country Club is a Sports game, developed and published by T&E; Soft, which was released in Japan in 1994.

software.name: Way of the Warrior
software.Description: The planet's greatest warriors have been assembled in a citadel, high atop the Himalayan mountains. It is here that only one challenger will survive and have his name etched with magical blood into the Book of Warriors. The tournament will bring together good, evil, mortal, and immortal. The outcome will lie in the hands of one... you! Find the way, noble challenger, find the Way of the Warrior!

software.name: Who Shot Johnny Rock?
software.Description: It's the rollicking 30's and someone has killed popular singer Johnny Rock in this action-packed gangster whodunit. The player will need to navigate the back streets, gaming halls, funeral parlors and the dirty sections of this city to get at the clues held by a number of shady characters and solve this murder mystery. Bad guys with machine guns provide a high level of shooting action.

software.name: Wicked 18
software.Description: Wicked 18 is a Sports game, published by T&E; Soft, which was released in Japan in 1995.

software.name: Wing Commander III: Heart of the Tiger
software.Description: Professionally scripted and filmed in Hollywood, ORIGIN's multi-million dollar production combines the entertainment of film-making with the interactivity of gaming. The result is a spectacular spaceflight adventure! Adrenaline, romance, humor, danger - Wing Commander III has all this and more. This intriguing story completes the turbulent chronicles of the Terran-Kilrathi war. The final showdown takes place on one of the homeworlds. But only you can write the ending...

software.name: Wolfenstein 3D
software.Description: You're deep in the heart of Castle Wolfenstein, the feared Nazi prisoner-of-war camp. It's packed with heavily-armed soldiers. And you've heard rumors of twisted biological experiments used as guards. At least nobody is shooting at you... yet. All you've got is a knife, a pistol, and your wits to get you through all ninety levels of Wolfenstein 3D!
